name: SimpleFeedback.com
tag_list: feedback, feedback-button, feedback-widget, feedback-form, feedback-management-system, wordpress-feedback, wordpress-plugin, wordpress-widget, iphone-feedback, ios-feedback
overview:
SimpleFeedback.com is cloud-based service which provides a feedback system for websites, blogs, and mobile applications.

Easily customize a feedback button or widget and feedback form for your application. The feedback form designer walks you through many form customization options. Customizable feedback types and categories let your users self-classify their feedback, making it easy for you to sort and manage submitted feedback.

All code is provided to add a feedback button or widget and feedback form to your website, WordPress blog, or iOS/iPhone application. Paste the code to your website, or add a plug-in to your WordPress blog, or link with our iOS library.

Taking only minutes to implement, you’ll be collecting feedback from users right away. Get notified anytime feedback is submitted.

The feedback center allows you and others in your company to respond to users, track issues, view reports, and much more.

Feedback can be used for many purposes. Use feedback during beta to gather problems. Use feedback in production to gather customer suggestions and testimonials. With plans that include multiple feedback forms, you can create different feedback forms on your website for different purposes (e.g. one for sales and one for support).
